DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to develop a tool to help researchers better understand what diet information people know and what skills they use to make diet choices.
DOC.brief_title: Adaptation and Validation of a Nutrition Literacy Assessment Instrument
DOC.criteria: Able to speak and read English Have 1 or more of the following diseases: diabetes, hyperlipidemia, hypertension, and/or overweight/obesity Visual acuity insufficient to read the testing instrument Cognitive impairment Weight > 500 pounds
